name: I'm Outta Here! (Zawghu, branung, morioriohno)
description:
After being defeated, the ghost of the Shadow Lord Ragnar must escape his own castle. Explore 5 different areas, find new abilities, and escape!

*If you expirence performance issues in browser please try switching browsers or downloading the standalone version*

Made in 28 days for the Metroidvania Month 19  gamejam.
